description: 【English version】Update 2023.12.22,  Includes: CPU, memory, disk IO, network, temperature and other monitoring metrics

panels.description: Highest amount of memory Redis has used since it started.
panels.title: Redis Peak Memory (Since Start)

panels.description: Total Memory currently used by the Redis server, measured in MB.
panels.title: Redis Memory Used

panels.description: total number of objects collected (cleaned up) by the garbage collector for each generation (0, 1, or 2).
panels.title: Python GC Objects Collected

panels.description: Rate of change (increase or decrease) of memory usage by the Python process over the last 5 minutes
panels.title: Python memory Leak

panels.description: how long Redis has been running since the last start.
panels.title: Redis uptime

panels.description: how many clients are currently connected to the Redis server
panels.title: Active Redis Connection

panels.description: total number of objects that could not be collected (possibly memory leaks) for each GC generation.
panels.title: Python GC Objects Uncollected

panels.description: Current size of the managed heap (in MB), i.e., how much memory is in use by .NET objects (post-GC).
panels.title: Active CLR memory Usage

panels.description: The current number of threads in the thread pool (worker + I/O threads).
panels.title: Threads in pool

panels.description: Current number of active SQL connections your .NET app is holding at the time of the scrape.
panels.title: Active SQL connections

panels.description: Maximum response time for 95% of API requests over the past 1 minute
panels.title: API response Time

title: Spark_Window
